description:
First release of macOS 26 Tahoe.

Refer to Apple's webpages for information about this release — there's too many new features to mention here!:

macOS Tahoe 26.0 Release Notes

About the security content of macOS Tahoe
This update provides important bug fixes, security updates, and resolves an issue that prevented some users from upgrading to macOS Tahoe on Mac Studio (M3 Ultra, 2025).

This update includes the following features and enhancements:
  • Liquid Glass setting gives you the option to choose between the default clear look or a new tinted look which increases opacity of the material in apps
  • Apple Music AutoMix support over AirPlay
  • Improved FaceTime audio quality in low-bandwidth conditions
  • Communication Safety and Web content filters to limit adult websites are enabled by default for existing child accounts for ages 13–17 (age varies by country or region)

Refer to Apple's webpages for information about this release:

macOS Tahoe 26.2 Release Notes

About the security content of macOS Tahoe 26.2
